title: Can't Purchase RP Stuck on Step 3
body: So I'm currently trying to purchase RP however whenever I do it gets stuck on Step 3: Confirm Details and the little loading symbol just keeps going on anon and on, and I have no idea how to fix it, if anyone has an an answer please let me know! (I'm trying to purchase 10$ worth of RP and I am using PayPal if that helps)

replies.body: It sounds like your payment isn't able to process, but we can help!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can take a look.  We'll figure out what's going on!
